title: Rail delays after person hit by train near Reading - BBC News
summary: a person was hit by train at twyford station , at about 15:45 bst .
there were delays of at least 90 minutes between reading and paddington .
reading were playing arsenal at the emirates stadium .
rail services have returned to normal .

documents.title: people running to catch trains at paddington
text: people running to catch trains at paddington

documents.title: disruptions expected for 24 hours
text: some lines have now reopened , but great western railway said there are delays of up to 70 minutes , and disruptions could continue until 20:00 tomorrow .

documents.title: delays of 90 minutes continue as lines reopen
text: delays of 90 minutes are expected as all lines reopen to london paddington .
earlier today great western railway services were suspended in berkshire after a person was hit by a train in twyford .
although lines have reopened , trains will not stop at burnham , taplow , maidenhead and twyford .
there will also be no service between twyford and henley-on-thames .

documents.title: reading fans stranded before match at emirates stadium
text: 2/4 lines reopened but still disruption between reading and london .
worried football fans # afcvrfc @ twitterid @ twitterid # gwr

documents.title: no news is good news ?
text: departure boards at london paddington have been left blank due to cancellations on services running through berkshire .
chaos at paddington - no trains displayed or leaving .
dinner @ twitterid

documents.title: scores of people waiting as train delays cause commuter chaos at paddington
text: paddington at 18:00 .
no trains , no information , no early night !
@ twitterid
that looks a bid depressing hope you were n't too late home x
unfortunately disruption due to person hit by a train earlier .
screens will show trains when confirmed as running .
-ollie

all lines are now open via twyford .
there are delays of up to 40 mins to/from london paddington as a person was hit by a train earlier .
services expected to be running normally to/from london paddington tomorrow morning .
apologies for disruption experienced via twyford today .

the lines still have a lot of trains on them that need to filter down on the lines so then more can move .
jess
all well and good , but if all platforms have trains sitting at them where are they gon na go ?
need to start moving people !
toilets need to opened up to passengers for free !
lots of kids around as half term
the lines are congested with other trains , so we ca n't just moved them .
toilets opening would be up to @ twitterid jess
in the interest of your customers , maybe some dialogue between you , unless you are more like @ twitterid
we can suggest it , and we do share ideas .
jess
great but nothing on the board at paddington and no rail timetable updates on the app either .
trains will be posted on screens as they 're confirmed as running .
-ollie

documents.title: delays remain
text: national rail has just repeated the information that delays of up to 90 minutes are expected .
earlier , disruption was expected to last until 18:30 .
journeys between # londonpaddington and reading are being delayed by up to 90 minutes , with some services cancelled .

documents.title: massive delays on trains at london paddington
text: although three of four lines have reopened there are still significant delays across the gwr network .
but some can see the funny side .
at paddington reading `` girl on a train '' .
v jealous as all my trains are delayed
great book .
seen the film ?

documents.title: 'berkshire train users should consider marylebone service '
text: great western railway ( gwr ) is advising customers to seek alternative modes of transport after services in berkshire have been incapacitated .
speaking on bbc radio berkshire , gwr spokesman dan panes said people closer to oxfordshire should consider taking crosscountry services to london marylebone .
gwr tickets will be valid on these services .

documents.title: london bus routes accepting rail tickets
text: arrangements have been made for great western railway rail tickets to be accepted for these journeys .
it comes after bus services in berkshire also began accepting rail tickets .

documents.title: waterloo services impacted by twyford incident
text: trains between reading and waterloo are busier than normal at present due to disruption on paddington route

documents.title: gwr statement
text: a statement on the gwr website reads :
due to a person being hit by a train between reading and slough all lines are blocked .
`` train services running to and from these stations may be cancelled , delayed by up to 90 minutes or revised .
disruption is expected until 18:30 25/10 .

documents.title: emergency services finish their efforts
text: # londonpaddington - emergency services have now dealt with the incident at twyford , allowing all lines at the station to reopen .

best to call us and we can look into this for you .

promised emails and letters and call backs and nothing comes .
shocking service
i am sorry , but we do n't have the records here .
you would need to call and speak to an advisor .
jess
utter chaos at paddington .
as usual gwr staff have no idea on what trains will run to where and when .
services are being amended at short notice , sorry for the confusion .
best to keep an eye on the boards .
jess
do you mean these boards that are n't really much help to anyone ?
yes , as trains are confirmed they will be advertised on the screens .
-ollie

yes they are .

it will be busier , i 'm afraid we do n't have extra trains to put on though .

thanks .
there is room .

documents.title: queues 'snaking around reading station ' as trains delayed until 18:30
text: queues of commuters and football fans are `` snaking around reading station '' as rail delays continue .
radio berkshire 's nick johnson is on the scene .

documents.title: train tickets accepted on buses
text: according to gwr , these bus services are accepting tickets for their services :

they also say that : `` during this disruption if you wish to use local buses as an alternative means of transport and the local bus is not accepting great western railway tickets please purchase a ticket for the bus journey , keep the bus ticket and send it , together with your rail ticket , to us for a refund of the bus fare . ''

text: gooners grace , george , vicky facing a car journey in to london due to train delays @ twitterid @ twitterid # afcvrfc # gwr

documents.title: suspended trains affecting trains in oxfordshire
text: service suspended on # gwr between # reading and # slough due to an incident on the line at # twyford .
affecting trains from # didcotparkway .
told alight at d'cot , get slow train to r'ding & l'don.i stay & laff as train goes 5 mins later ! pickup at r'ding on empty train !

documents.title: breakingpolice investigating death of 'person struck by a train '
text: british transport police have confirmed that a person was hit by a train at twyford station , at about 15:45 bst .
ambulances also attended the scene , but the person was pronounced dead at the scene , police are not treating the incident as sus
a spokesperson added : `` we are now working to identify the person and inform their family . ''

documents.title: football fans warned about delays
text: the railway incident will also impact reading fc fans , who are heading to the emirates stadium tonight to take on arsenal in the efl cup .
reading-waterloo line is currently operational as usual , alternatively high wycombe to marylebone is suggested for those able to get there .
@ twitterid @ twitterid

thanks
is every train to paddington delayed for two hours ?
gwr say chiltern railways , cross country , south west trains and london underground are conveying passengers via any `` reasonable route '' until further notice .
arrangements have been made for great western railway rail tickets to be accepted for these journeys .
